description: Schema for submitting a human genetic varient.
title: Allele

___sequence.description: DNA sequence of the variant bases (-) for deletion
___sequence.title: Sequence

___dbxref.description: Unique identifiers from external resources (e.g. ClinVar, dbVar).
___dbxref.title: External identifiers

items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
items.comment: Submit as database name:target name (e.g. HGNC:HMFN0395, GeneID:22809)
items.title: External identifier
